title: How to Message a Yelp Member Without Friending Them

steps.headline: Visit the Yelp web page in your web browser.
Click the "Send Message" link, from any business' listing's reviews.
steps.description: It can be found to the right of the name.

steps.headline: Type your subject in the "Subject" line, and your "Message" in the next box in the in-page pop-up.
Click the red with white lettering "Send" button.
Click the red (with white lettering) "Compose" button located at the top of the main "Messaging" tabs listing of all messages.
steps.description: From the in-page pop-up, you only will be able to send a message to your Yelp friends.

steps.headline: Click the check box to the left of the user's icon.
steps.description: To eliminate some users, search by specific users names, by clicking into the "Search by a Friends name" box and typing this specific users name (preferably just first). As you type, the list will be modified.

steps.headline: Type your subject message and click the "Send message" button.
Watch your regular email mailbox or look in the top tabs area and click "Messaging" from any of pages on Yelp.
Type something in the "Reply" box.
steps.description:
To send, click the red (with white lettering) "Reply" button. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/27\/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/27\/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":257,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":423.84615384615387,"licensing":"

tyn: textual content to send to a Yelp friend (no other content allowed)
text:
Steps Visit the Yelp web page in your web browser. Search for a business. Sending a Message Click the "Send Message" link, from any business' listing's reviews. It can be found to the right of the name. Type your subject in the "Subject" line, and your "Message" in the next box in the in-page pop-up. Click the red with white lettering "Send" button. Click the red (with white lettering) "Compose" button located at the top of the main "Messaging" tabs listing of all messages. From the in-page pop-up, you only will be able to send a message to your Yelp friends. Click the check box to the left of the user's icon. To eliminate some users, search by specific users names, by clicking into the "Search by a Friends name" box and typing this specific users name (preferably just first). As you type, the list will be modified. Type your subject message and click the "Send message" button. Replying to Replies Watch your regular email mailbox or look in the top tabs area and click "Messaging" from any of pages on Yelp. If there is a reply, you'll see that the subject line has gotten a new "RE:" attached to the beginning of the older subject line. Click on this subject line. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/08/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/08/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":286,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":471.86813186813185,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} As you see by the page that results, the entire conversation is listed on the page. Read/scroll down through the list. Follow down until you see the "Reply" box. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a6/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a6/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/v4-760px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":253,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":417.5824175824176,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Type something in the "Reply" box. To send, click the red (with white lettering) "Reply" button. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/27/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/27/Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Message-Other-Members-of-Yelp-Without-Friending-Them-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":257,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":423.84615384615387,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}
sentences: Steps Visit the Yelp web page in your web browser.
Search for a business.
Sending a Message Click the "Send Message" link, from any business' listing's reviews.
It can be found to the right of the name.
Type your subject in the "Subject" line, and your "Message" in the next box in the in-page pop-up.
Click the red with white lettering "Send" button.
Click the red (with white lettering) "Compose" button located at the top of the main "Messaging" tabs listing of all messages.
From the in-page pop-up, you only will be able to send a message to your Yelp friends.
Click the check box to the left of the user's icon.
To eliminate some users, search by specific users names, by clicking into the "Search by a Friends name" box and typing this specific users name (preferably just first).
As you type, the list will be modified.
Type your subject message and click the "Send message" button.
Replying to Replies Watch your regular email mailbox or look in the top tabs area and click "Messaging" from any of pages on Yelp.
If there is a reply, you'll see that the subject line has gotten a new "RE:" attached to the beginning of the older subject line.
Click on this subject line.

\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} As you see by the page that results, the entire conversation is listed on the page.
Read/scroll down through the list.
Follow down until you see the "Reply" box.

\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Type something in the "Reply" box.
To send, click the red (with white lettering) "Reply" button.
